articles.title: 75-year-old fears he will not see daughter again after missing out on three months of MIQ spots in 20 seconds - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: NZ-based American Bruce Petty says he tried 20 times a day for two weeks to book a spot in managed isolation and now has a feeling he is 'not going to make it'.

articles.title: Washington Football Team's new name, logo will have no 'linkage to Native American imagery,' president Jason Wright says - ESPN
articles.description: The Washington Football Team will not consider Warriors as a new nickname as the franchise is departing from any link to Native American imagery, president Jason Wright said Monday.

articles.title: Argentina 1-0 Brazil: Lionel Messi wins major international trophy as Angel Di Maria fires nation to Copa America glory - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Argentina win their first major trophy in 28 years and their 15th Copa America trophy after a 1-0 win over fierce rivals Brazil at the Maracana Stadium.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi wins the Copa America with Argentina in his 10th major tournament
